author: aconway
msg: QPID-2920: Allow stopping consumers on queues.
Stop consumers from dispatching and wait for already dispatching consumers to exit.

author: aconway
msg: QPID-2920: Sleep on cpg flow control to avoid thrashing.
Added a 1ms sleep when CPG is flow controlled. Huge thruput

author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-3339: fix deadlock case when multiple threads add/update doc blocks

msg: Remove the @override annotation, because it's no more needed.
